title: (x) ID: Capizzi logo - ITC Korinna {Florian}
content:
Hi guys

A friend of mine is trying to identify the font in this logo. He tried in What the font?, but no luck.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017130723im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cont01_6396.jpeg)
author: Cristobal Henestrosa

comments.content:
Hi Cristobal,

– because WTF is just a machine! ;-)  
I think it is [Ed Benguiat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017130723/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Edward%20Benguiat)’s [ITC Korinna](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017130723/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-korinna/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCAPIZZI%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D25), [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017130723/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed).  
F
